title: 077: Staying Healthy While Busy with Nicole of Splendid Spoon
itunes:title: 077: Staying Healthy While Busy with Nicole of Splendid Spoon
description:
We all want to be healthy but the lifestyle can be super time-consuming. That's why Nicole created a vegan, Ayurveda-inspired food delivery service that now delivers food nationwide. In this episode we discuss:

-Why warm food is recommended for digestion over cold
-Creating a business while managing your personal self-care
-Choosing what makes you feel nourished
-Why food is community and life source
-The bioavailability of soup

Check out SpendidSpoon.com/Sahara for $25 off your order, nationwide.
Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic with code "sahara"
Receive 20% off Hum Nutrition with code "SAHARA"


Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
